Wesley, that looks like a very nice tutorial for people getting started. =
 It should make SharpNEAT 2 even more accessible to interested users.  It m=
ight be helpful to link to your tutorials from the NEAT and HyperNEAT Users=
 Pages, what do you think?

ken

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Wesley Tansey=
 <tansey@...> wrote:
>
> Hi all,
> 
> I wrote a short tutorial on how to us=
e SharpNEAT 2 to create a 
> Tic-Tac-Toe AI: http://www.nashcoding.com/?p=
=3D90
> 
> The tutorial covers the basics of setting up the experiment, run=
ning the 
> EA, and handling file I/O. It's part 1 in a series of at least =
3 
> tutorials. The next tutorial will cover co-evolution and the third one=
 
> will cover HyperNEAT, so hopefully the resulting NNs will get 
> progre=
ssively stronger.
> 
> Thoughts, comments, or questions are always welcome.=

> 
> Wesley
>
